messages.message: Hey so, me and my best friend got into a huge fight, and dont want this to end out relationship... Any advice?

ai_replies.full: I think the best thing to do in this situation would be to explain your view on what the argument was about, and come to an agreement.

ai_replies.display: Apologize and tell them why you were wrong.
ai_replies.full: You should apologize to them, explaining why what you did was wrong and how you will better youself as a person.

goto.message: Thanks a lot Rex /gen, I can't think straight when im stressed
But- I actually didn't do anything wrong?- Did you even listen too me?-
